name: places/ChIJRa-jxQvtwokROyoPM2qo4BI
formattedAddress: 220 E 57th St Suite 14E, New York, NY 10022, USA
adrFormatAddress: 220 E 57th St Suite 14E, New York, NY 10022, USA

originalText.text:
L&H absolutely transformed my place, and working with them was a pleasure. I had a long list of improvements that I needed, and Albert, the owner, answered all my questions, took note of everything I wanted done, and provided me with a prompt quote that covered everything. Pricing was fair and up-front, work started right on time, and the whole process went very smoothly. After work completed, my neighbors commented to me about how polite and respectful the team was.

One standout improvement was a curtain valance that needed to be rebuilt to accommodate larger curtains. The original valance was a makeshift-looking plywood structure, and Albert proposed a way to remodel it that turned it into one of the design highlights of the room. All of the other work was also done to a high standard: planning and scheduling were efficient and professional, and the results are amazing!

originalText.text: From start to finish L&H is by far the best construction contractor I've used to remodel any of my residences over the past 30 years. Their estimate was accurate and thorough and came with a schedule they adhered to without once sacrificing quality. Every employee was an expert at their job, came to the job site clean and well dressed and adhered to my building's rules. The attention to detail in remodeling the guest bathroom and kitchen was amazing. I wish I had another project to collaborate with them on as the outcome is so stunning!

originalText.text: I'm so lucky to have found L&H.  I have worked with many other contractors and without question, these guys are the best.  I know it's hard to believe but these guys are honest, give you a fair price, use quality materials, do exactly what they say, don't nickel and dime you and finish the work when they say it will be finished.  The workers are nice, respectful and keep the place clean.  They installed my marble floors, renovated my master bathroom, sound proofed many of our walls, installed our fireplace, renovated our terrace and built a marble wall in the living room.  They can do anything - it's truly amazing.  Albert, the owner, is easy to talk to and will give you an honest assessment of what needs to be done and how much it will cost.  He will not low ball the price to get the business and then upsell you throughout the process.  Ask him to talk to prior clients - they will all praise his work.  He had to fix so many problems my old contractor did wrong.  I highly recommend these guys.

originalText.text: L&H General Construction has done three major renovation projects on our home in the last 10 years and each one was done to perfection.  Their workmanship is unparalleled and attention to detail is superior.  I highly recommend them to anyone who is looking for a Contractor who does a superior job and stands by their work completely.

originalText.text: L&H General Construction LLC is a great company. They remodeled the lobby at  611 Broadway  in 2020, they did a great job.  They plastered and painted the walls, the ceiling and crown molding. They also remodeled the lobby stairs. Great work performance and great guys to communicate  with. They got the job done on time, no headache, no surprises .
